title: Special Preview - Lights Out w/ Shawne Merriman Joined By Former NFL MVP & 7-Time Pro Bowler Adrian Peterson
itunes:title: Special Preview - Lights Out w/ Shawne Merriman Joined By Former NFL MVP & 7-Time Pro Bowler Adrian Peterson
description:
Lights Out and All Day have some fun on this episode of the Lights Out Podcast. Adrian Peterson wants to go at least a few more years and he tells you that the best is yet to come. Also, Shawne relives the day AP torched the Chargers with his 296 yard rushing day. And, will Shawne and Adrian step into the boxing ring together? Find out on this episode of the Light Out Podcast.


SUBSCRIBE TO LIGHTS OUT W/ SHAWNE MERRIMAN HERE....

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lights-out-with-shawne-merriman/id1531749581
